document_data.mainbody:
Stump was a locksmith in Skullport in the mid-14 century DR.
Stump, the owner of Stumps Locksmithy, was renowned for his skill in crafting highly sophisticated locks and traps. Despite his physical limitations, being one-handed and nearsighted, Stumpâ€™s ingenuity and craftsmanship made his work sought after by those who value security in Skullport. He was also an avid chess player,
